tips.text: Must try the fluffy omelette!
Shiomaru ramen with Tamago
Salmon skin
We could smell the Ribs and scallop paella from the other table. We caved in knowing that the chefs are already making our vege paella.
Won 2014 Best New Restaurant in Peak Mag, alongside with Bacchanalia. For eating places delivering superb dining experience. Photo: Straits Times
Crispy fried chicken was very good. Crispy and moist. My piece was quite big.

formattedAddress: Far East Shopping Centre #03-18/19 (545 Orchard Road)

tips.text: Nice cosy place and yummy food.
Crazily overpriced. $31 for breakfast and coffee? A service charge even though you place orders at the counter?

formattedAddress: #01-05 Pan Pacific Serviced Suites (96 Somerset Rd.)

tips.text: Great steak, don't forget to order sides like Mac and cheese and cream spinach .
Katsu comes with rice, miso soup, steamed egg, and salad. Rice and salad are refillable.
Very Nice restaurant
The marinated beef boneless short rib is awesome. Overall tasty and the buffet is truly value for money!

venue.name: Fragrant Hot Pot 飄香麻辣香鍋

tips.text: Heavenly good hot pot 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
Love the dimsum here! A must visit Chinese dim sum restaurant in a hotel that's being registered as monument.

venue.name: Bari-Uma Ramen ばり馬ラーメン (Bari-Uma Ramen)

tips.text: This place is pretty underrated. Definitely deserves more customers than it has. Just located at a secluded corner of tanglin.
Great Chilli Crab on Saturday

formattedAddress: Level 3, Paragon Shopping Centre (290 Orchard Rd)

tips.text: 31 sgd for 1 expresso, 1 chocolate, 1 lousy apple pie...god they really don't care about anything else but your money.
Ask for Eggs Benedict.  Not well advertised, but definitely a buffet option.  Hollandaise can be spotty.
Best to make reservation beforehand to prevent disappointment. [67363800] Opens till 230am on the weekends! :D
Chicago mix is the ultimate choice. Even when you eat, you must eat both flavors together to enjoy the nice blend of the cheese and caramel.
Come here with a friend - portions are for 2 and up.

formattedAddress: #01-01 Pan Pacific Serviced Suites (96 Somerset Rd)

tips.text: Great coffees and great place to chill!
Roast pork is awesome
Try the Siomay... Indo banget dech...
Service is kinda horrible. It is like as though you owe them something.

formattedAddress: Level 5, Mandarin Orchard Singapore (333 Orchard Rd.)

tips.text: Most expensive chicken rice in Singapore isn't really worth the price. See pictures and review at http://sparklette.net/food/chatterbox-mandarin-orchard/
Best authentic Japanese grill in town!
Best pastrami in Asia. Amazing grilled Reuben sandwich
Affordable and yummy Japanese food! Must order the pork set as shown in my picture !

formattedAddress: The St. Regis Singapore (29 Tanglin Rd.)

tips.text: Really good stuff. Loved the Honey-glazed Oven-baked cod fish. juicy n cooked to perfection. Dimsum is worth mentioning to too! Try the Liu Sha Bao!  #ThomtoriEats
cosy is an understatement for this 20-something seater. friendly sommelier but we wished the staff had more knowledge of the menus. overall food was great; the pappardelle is definitely recommended.
Do not order the Tom yum soup during peak hours. It has laska taste in it.
Large is BEST 👍👍👍
Yummy fish/squid!
Big portion of meals and great desserts
